title: A good vvife Gods gift and, a vvife indeed. Tvvo mariage sermons. By Thomas Gataker B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Hauiland for Fulke Clifton,
notes: The first sermon is reprinted from "Two mariage sermons" by Gataker and William Bradshaw.
"A vvife indeed" (caption title) has separate pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
